de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary

Class ChatMessageValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary.ChatMessageValidator

  • public class ChatMessageValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class allowing a convenient API to check the validity of ChatMessages based on a set of known public keys. The public keys against which the messages are to be validated need to be injected at construct-time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatMessageValidator(java.util.List<ChatPublicKey> publicKeys)
      Constructs a new validator for the given public keys.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean validate(ListChatMessage message)
      Perform the validation of the signature attached to the given chat message instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatMessageValidator

        public ChatMessageValidator(java.util.List<ChatPublicKey> publicKeys)
        Constructs a new validator for the given public keys.
        Parameters:
        publicKeys - public key

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public boolean validate(ListChatMessage message)
        Perform the validation of the signature attached to the given chat message instance. The validation is performed against the list of public keys given to the validator instance at construction-time.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be validated
        Returns:
        True if the signature is valid, False otherwise
